name: Extended WooCommerce Customer Management for Users Insights
author: denizz

sections.description:
Extends the default WooCommerce customer management of the Users Insights plugin by adding the following features:

Ordered WooCommerce products for each user

While the Users Insights plugin provides options to filter the customers by the products that they have(or not) purchased, it doesn’t actually list the purchased products in the table. This plugin makes an “Ordered Products” column available in the user table that lets you see the ordered WooCommerce products list for each user.
Please note that this column is not available in the export.

WooCommerce order notes in the user profile section

Extends the Users Insights customer notes feature, by showing the WooCommerce order notes below the customer notes. Only the manually entered notes are displayed (system notes are not displayed). Each note also contains info about the order and a link to the order page.
sections.installation:
1. Make sure that the Users Insights plugin is installed and activated.
  2. Log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.
  3. In the search field type “WooCommerce Management for Users Insights” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found the plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.
  4. Go to the Users Insights page and click on the “Eye” icon to make the new columns visible on the table

short_description: Extends the WooCommerce Customer Management of the Users Insights plugin by providing additional WooCommerce order data in the customer activity table
